DOC.brief_summary: To assess and compare the complications and results of different lamellar endothelial keratoplasty techniques and its variations.
DOC.brief_title: Technique And Results In Endothelial Keratoplasty
DOC.criteria: 1. Diagnosis with corneal endothelial dysfunction requiring lamellar endothelial corneal transplantation. 2. Free acceptance to be enrolled in the trial, and signature of the informed consent by the subject and/or its legal representatives.
